text: Prayer for Yahweh’s Action in the Face of Scorn
A song of ascents.\f + \fr Ps 123 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm \f*
I lift up my eyes to you,
the one enthroned\f + \fr 123:1 \ft Or “the one who dwells” \f* in the heavens.
Behold, as \add the\add* eyes of servants
\add look\add* to the hand of their master,\f + \fr 123:2 \ft Hebrew “masters” \f*
as \add the\add* eyes of a maid to the hand of her mistress,
so our eyes \add look\add* to Yahweh our God,
until he is gracious to us.
Be gracious to us, O Yahweh, be gracious to us,
for long enough we have had our fill of contempt.
For long enough our soul has had its fill of
